post.summary: Returns the specified connection.
post.description:
NsApiSlow threshold: 5000 ms.
<para />## Online Restricted: ## The ErpSync agent is not available in Online by default. Access must be requested specifically when app is registered. Intended for ERP integration apps.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Optional comma separated list of properties to include in the result. Other fields are then nulled out to reduce payload size: "Name,department,category". Default = show all fields.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code.

parameters.name: SO-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code. Overrides Accept-Language value.

parameters.name: SO-Culture
parameters.description: Number, date formatting in a specified culture (iso2 language) code. Partially overrides SO-Language/Accept-Language value. Ignored if no Language set.

parameters.name: SO-TimeZone
parameters.description: Specify the timezone code that you would like date/time responses converted to.

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

externalDocs.description: The SuperOffice DevNet Community has more documentation, examples, and discussion forums.

SuperOffice_Password.description:
SuperOffice username:password are passed in Base64-encoded. 

You can also pass inn an unencoded ticket 7T:abc== with the HTTP Authenticate header.

SuperId_Authentication.description:
SuperOffice SuperId OAuth implicit flow. 
You need to issue a request to the SuperId authorization URL
    https://online.superoffice.com/login/common/oauth/authorize?response_type=token
      &client_id=670734e0-4c5a-11e3-be9e-a171392e81db
      &redirect_uri=https://example.com/spa/

passing in the application id and redirect URL.

SuperId will log the user in, and redirect to the requested redirect URL with a #payload
containing the access token and claims. (The redirect URL must be registered with SuperId in advance)

   https://example.com/spa#access_token=8A%3aCust12227.AXRrCITpPBvQX3UbIohb
      &token_type=bearer
      &state=
      &expires_in=3600
      &ctx=Cust12227
      &netserver_url=https%3a%2f%2fsod.superoffice.com%2fCust12227%2fRemote%2fServices82%2f

You can take the #access_token value and pass it as the Authenticate HTTP header as a BEARER token.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.ErpSyncCa.description: GetConnection: Returns the specified connection.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ErpConnection.description:
Information about a connection to the ERP system.
<para />
Carrier object for ErpConnection.
Services for the ErpConnection Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IErpSyncAgent">ErpSync Agent</see>.

ErpConnectorId.description: The connector that this connection should call

DisplayName.description: Connection name shown to user; multi-language support

DisplayDescription.description: Tooltip/description shown to user; multi-language support

ConnectionId.description: The GUID that uniquely identifies this connection; passed to the Connector in every call

MostRecentTimestamp.description: Datetime, transaction number or other identification of the point in time of the most-recently seen actor in the ERP system

ConfigFields.description: The config fields needed to establish a connection to the connector

Deleted.description: If true, the connection has been deleted and should not be shown to the users.

AllAccess.description: Is this connection accessible to everyone?  If not, then the ErpConnectionAccess table tells us who can access it

UserGroupAccessIds.description: Array of ids containing usergroups that will have access to this connection.

AssociateAccessIds.description: Array of ids containing associates that will have access to this connection.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.TableRight.description:
Wraps a table right together with an explanatory reason.
Code can indicate why access is restricted.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.FieldProperty.description: Class holding properties like field length, field type about a field in the carrier.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.FieldRight.description:
Wraps the field right together with an explanatory reason.
Also adds logical operators to the field rights so that they can be easily combined.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.ErpSyncCa.description: SaveConnection: Saves a connection to the database.
DeleteConnection: Deletes a connection from the database.
GetConfigurationFields: Returns all fields needed to connect to the given connector

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.FieldMetadata.description:
This is used to populate the Admin configuration dialog for a connection. The call to the ERP Connectors GetConfigurationFields method returns a list of fields and field types. The Admin client builds a dialog with these fields
<para />
Carrier object for FieldMetadata.
Services for the FieldMetadata Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IQuoteAgent">Quote Agent</see>.

FieldKey.description: Internal key/name of the field. Used as the key in the ConnectionConfigField values when TestConnection is called.

Rank.description: A way to set the order of the fields. Lowest value will be displayed first/over the fields with other values.

DisplayName.description: Localized field name  shown in the GUI

ListName.description: MDO List provider name for list fields

DefaultValue.description: A default value for the field.

MaxLength.description: Maximum length for strings, if set. 0 means no restriction. (Though sooner or later something will no doubt overflow if you pile on the gigabytes.)

ShowInSearch.description: True if this field is displayed in search result

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.ErpSyncCa.description: GetErpConnectionConfigFields: Returns the config fields for the connection.
ToggleErpConnectionActive: Toggles the Active state of the connection
TestConnectionById: Tests to see if we can establish a connection with the given config fields
TestConnectionByConfig: Tests to see if the given connection has a valid connection to its connector
SaveErpConnectionSyncPriorities: Takes an array of the ErpConnection ids and saves these as ordered sync priorities
MoveErpFieldItem: Moves the rank of the erp field up or down
SupportsAdvancedSearch: Indicates if the connection supports advanced search for the given erp actor

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ListItem.description:
Lightweight generic list item - similar to MDOListItem but without child items and stuff
<para />
Carrier object for ListItem.
Services for the ListItem Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.ErpSyncCa.description: GetAllConnections: Returns all ERP Sync connections without config field data. Uses the `ErpConnection` archive.
GetConnectionsAndDisplayFields: Get all connection statuses and fields for a given entity

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ErpConnectionDa.description:
Contains connection data and field labels for one connection
<para />
Carrier object for ErpConnectionData.
Services for the ErpConnectionData Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IErpSyncAgent">ErpSync Agent</see>.

Connected.description: True if this entity instance has syncronized connection

ErpFields.description: The ERP fields that should be displayed

CrmActorType.description: The crm actor type which these fields belongs to

ErpActorType.description: The erp actor type which these fields belongs to

ErpActorTypes.description: Contains all mapped ErpActorType for this CrmActorType

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.ErpSyncCa.description: GetErpFieldValues: Get the values for the specified fields from the ERP connection
GetFieldsForNewErpActor: Get the fields that must be filled out when creating a new ERP actor
GetConnectionListMappings: Returns the listmappings for the specified connection.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ErpConnectionLi.description:
Information about all list connections for a connection between CRM and the ERP system.
<para />
Carrier object for ErpConnectionListMappingContainer.
Services for the ErpConnectionListMappingContainer Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IErpSyncAgent">ErpSync Agent</see>.

ErpConnectionName.description: The name of the erp connection

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ErpConnectionLi.description:
Information about a mapping between two lists between CRM and the ERP system.
<para />
Carrier object for ErpConnectionListMapping.
Services for the ErpConnectionListMapping Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IErpSyncAgent">ErpSync Agent</see>.

ErpListName.description: The ERP list name, if the field has a list of values supplied by the ERP Connector

ErpCrmListItemMappings.description: Array of all the list item mappings

ErpActorTypeName.description: The actorType belonging to the ListMapping

ErpFieldId.description: The id of the field that is using the lists. Readonly

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.MDOListItem.description:
Carrier object for MDOListItem.
Services for the MDOListItem Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IMDOAgent">MDO Agent</see>.

Deleted.description: The deleted status of the ListItem

Type.description: The type of the ListItem. Custom field.

ChildItems.description: The child items of the MDOListItem

IconHint.description: The Icon hint of the ListItem. Custom field.

ColorBlock.description: The color indicator of the ListItem color block

ExtraInfo.description: Extra information added to the ListItem. Could be information such as sort order etc or other meta data. Custom field.

StyleHint.description: Style hint indicating, information such as background color etc. Custom field.

FullName.description: The name of the ListItem in its context

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ErpCrmListItemM.description:
One list item mapping between erp and crm.
<para />
Carrier object for ErpCrmListItemMapping.
Services for the ErpCrmListItemMapping Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IErpSyncAgent">ErpSync Agent</see>.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.ErpSyncCa.description: SaveConnectionListMappings: Saves a connection to the database.
ConnectActor: Create a link between Erp and Crm and set default values

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ErpSyncFieldVal.description:
Carrier object for ErpSyncFieldValue.
Services for the ErpSyncFieldValue Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IErpSyncAgent">ErpSync Agent</see>.

CrmFieldKey.description: The CRM field name, as implemented by the Sync entities

SyncToCrm.description: Should value changes in ERP be automatically transferred to CRM

SyncToErp.description: Should value changes in CRM be automatically transferred to ERP

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.ErpSyncCa.description: TryConnectActor: Create a link between Erp and Crm and set default values
GetFieldValuesFromCrm: Get Crm Field values
GetFieldValuesFromErp: Get Erp Field values
GetActorTypeMapping: Get the current mappings for one connection/actor; connection+actor type = unique key

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ErpSyncActorTyp.description:
Mapping information for one Actor, contains array of field mappings (ERP <-> SuperOffice)
<para />
Carrier object for ErpSyncActorTypeMapping.
Services for the ErpSyncActorTypeMapping Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IErpSyncAgent">ErpSync Agent</see>.

FieldMappings.description: Array of individual field mappings; explicitly map to empty CrmFieldKey to indicate non-sync

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ErpSyncFieldMap.description:
Mapping information for one field pair (ERP <-> SuperOffice)
<para />
Carrier object for ErpSyncFieldMapping.
Services for the ErpSyncFieldMapping Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IErpSyncAgent">ErpSync Agent</see>.

CrmFieldKey.description: The CRM field name, as implemented by the Sync entities

CrmDisplayName.description: Display name of CRM field; ignored on Save

CrmDisplayTooltip.description: Tooltip text for CRM field; ignored on Save

ErpDisplayName.description: Display name of ERP field; ignored on Save

ErpDisplayTooltip.description: Tooltip text for ERP field; ignored on Save

SyncToCrm.description: Should value changes in ERP be automatically transferred to CRM

SyncToErp.description: Should value changes in CRM be automatically transferred to ERP

ShowInGui.description: Should this field be shown as a (read-only!) field in the CRM Gui

ShowInSearch.description: Should this field be shown in searches

AlreadyMapped.description: Is this ERPField already mapped in some other connection? If so, then it cannot be one-way mapped TO SuperOffice here

MissingInERP.description: This field existed previously, but now the connection no longer supports it. Probably not a good sign, unmap it...

MissingInCRM.description: This field existed previously, but now CRM no longer supports it (udef change?). Probably not a good sign, unmap it...

ListReference.description: Field is read-only, for lookup in gui

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.ErpSyncCa.description: CreateActorLink: Link a crm entity to an erp entity
BreakActorLink: Remove the link between a CRM entity and an ERP entity
CreateErpActorFromCrm: Create ErpActor from crm entity
SaveActorTypeMapping: Save mappings for a connection/actor
ValidateArchiveColumnConfig: Clear field info from table SUPERLISTCOLUMNSIZE if field mapping changed on given connection
UpdateConnectionFields: Gets all supported actor types, and all fields for each actor type, and save this state to the CRM database
GetCrmActorType: Retrieves the CrmActorType that are mapped to a specific ErpActorType for this connection
GetErpSyncConnectionSummary: Get a summary of the current ErpSync configuration/setup

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ErpSyncConnecti.description:
Summary of the current setup of the ERP Integration, for one ERP connection
<para />
Carrier object for ErpSyncConnectionSummary.
Services for the ErpSyncConnectionSummary Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IErpSyncAgent">ErpSync Agent</see>.

DisplayName.description: Connection name shown to user; multi-language support

DisplayDescription.description: Tooltip/description shown to user; multi-language support

LastSync.description: The time of the last sync

Actors.description: Summaries of the configuration of the actors configured for this connection

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ErpSyncActorSum.description:
Summary of the current setup of the ERP Integration, for one ERP actor
<para />
Carrier object for ErpSyncActorSummary.
Services for the ErpSyncActorSummary Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IErpSyncAgent">ErpSync Agent</see>.

HasMappings.description: Does this actor type have field mappings

Defaults.description: A summary of fields that have defaults/rules for link creation

Mappings.description: A summary of fields that have mappings to or from the ERP system

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ErpSyncConnecto.description:
Erp connector information
<para />
Carrier object for ErpSyncConnectorEntity.
Services for the ErpSyncConnectorEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IErpSyncAgent">ErpSync Agent</see>.

URL.description: The URL where the connector is located and can be called

Deleted.description: True if the connector is deleted

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.ErpSyncCa.description: CanDeleteErpSyncConnectorEntity: Can we delete the connector?
TestConnectorUrl: Test if connector urls anwers
SaveDefaultValueInfo: Save information about a default value for an ERP field

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ErpSyncDefaultV.description:
Contains default value information for one ERP field
<para />
Carrier object for ErpSyncDefaultValue.
Services for the ErpSyncDefaultValue Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IErpSyncAgent">ErpSync Agent</see>.

DefaultValue.description: Default value, stored using CultureDataFormatter format if it is not a string

HasFirstSyncDefaultValue.description: Should a default value be set on first sync

FirstSyncDefaultValue.description: The default value to be set, can be blank

PromptUser.description: Should the field be shown in the first-sync GUI; independent of whether a default value should be set

Mandatory.description: Should the user be forced to set a value (the Erp Connector may declare fields mandatory as well)

ListName.description: The ERP list name, if the field has a list of values supplied by the ERP Connector

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.ErpSyncCa.description: GetDefaultValueInfo: Get information about default value for an ERP field

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.PluginResponse.description:
PluginResponse exists to be able to respond with more than just a true/false, but also an explanation. Such an explanation can be displayed on for instance a disabled Place Order button.
<para />
Carrier object for PluginResponse.
Services for the PluginResponse Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IQuoteAgent">Quote Agent</see>.

IsOk.description: Answer to the question / An indication if the operation went well. Equivalent to Status != Error

UserExplanation.description: A localized explanation to the answer. Text here is displayed to the user.

Status.description: QuoteStatus = Ok / OkWithInfo / Warn / Error. Error implies IsOk = false.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ChangedData.description:
Generic carrier, used in return values to indicate what data NetServer has changed 'behind the scenes' so clients can know what to update
<para />
Carrier object for ChangedData.
Services for the ChangedData Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IQuoteAgent">Quote Agent</see>.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ChangedDataItem.description:
Tablename/recordid pair used to refer to records
<para />
Carrier object for ChangedDataItem.
Services for the ChangedDataItem Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IQuoteAgent">Quote Agent</see>.

Tablename.description: Name of table, standardized to lowercase

RecordId.description: Id of record, should never be 0

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.ErpSyncCa.description: ForceResync: Force resync from CRM or given Erp connection to all other connections
ForceResyncNoBlankValues: Force resync from CRM or given Erp connection to all other connections and tell the sync that you don't want blank values to overwrite non-blank values. Useful on import.
ForceResyncBatchTask: Start batch task to force resync from CRM or given Erp connection to all other connections
ForceResyncExternal: Force resync from CRM or given Erp connection to all other connections, using external keys

ForceResyncExternalNoBlankValues: Force resync from CRM or given Erp connection to all other connections, using external keys, and tell the sync that you don't want blank values to overwrite non-blank values. Useful on import.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ErpSyncEngineSt.description:
Status of the Sync engine
<para />
Carrier object for ErpSyncEngineStatus.
Services for the ErpSyncEngineStatus Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IErpSyncAgent">ErpSync Agent</see>.

StatusMessage.description: Current status message from the engine

Interval.description: The interval for each iteration of the sync engine

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.ErpSyncCa.description: ChangeEngineStatus: Change the current running/stopped status of the Sync engine
ChangeEngineInterval: Change the interval for each run of the Sync Engine
